content:
SpcInfo Struct

Definition

This class supports the Visual Basic Print and PrintLine functions.

In this Article

[System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Never)]
public struct SpcInfo
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
SpcInfo
Attributes
EditorBrowsableAttribute

Remarks

This class supports the Visual Basic Print and PrintLine functions. It is not intended to be used directly from your code.

For more information, see Print and PrintLine.

Fields

Count

This field supports the Visual Basic Print and PrintLine functions.

public short Count;
Attributes
EditorBrowsableAttribute

Remarks

This field supports the Visual Basic Print and PrintLine functions. It is not intended to be used directly from your code.

For more information, see Print and PrintLine.
